name: Ashley Bickerton
caption: "Made's Warung" 2006 , image courtesy Lehmann Maupin Gallery
summary: Ashley Bickerton (born 1959 in Barbados) is a contemporary artist, presently living in Bali. A mixed-media artist, Bickerton often combines photographic and painterly elements with industrial and found object assemblages. He is associated with the early 1980s art movement Neo-Geo, which includes artists such as Peter Halley.
